data.title: Sol Levinson & Bros., Inc. Funeral Home
data.meta_description: For over 125 years, Sol Levinson & Bros. has been providing exceptional funeral care to the Jewish community in Baltimore, Howard County and surrounding areas from generation to generation through compassion, education, and personalization.
data.text:
Since 1892, our family has provided care and support to the community through the most vulnerable of times – the death of a loved one.

Sol Levinson & Bros.' commitment to excellence has always been to fulfill your family’s wishes and traditions. The funeral service can make a tremendous difference in helping your family grieve, while honoring the memory of your loved one.

Over the years, our family members may have changed, but our core principles have not. The foundation of the way we operate has always been the same: do the right thing. One generation teaches the next, reinforcing the importance of the sacred trust that has been placed in us, and the professional and dignified manner in which we carry out our work. Every generation has learned from the one before, and continues to carry on our duty to give back to the community in which we live; a commitment that begins with providing exceptional care and attention to the families we serve.

We stand behind our tradition of providing quality service that begins with the initial phone call; including providing the resources needed to cope in the months following the funeral of your loved one. We are committed to easing your worries, letting you focus on healing and honoring the life and memories of those you hold dear.
